text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Homma was born on November 5, 1964. She played for Shimizudaihachi SC and Shizuoka Koki LSC. In June 1981, Homma was selected by the Japan national team for the 1981 AFC Championship. At this competition, on June 7, she debuted against Chinese Taipei. This match was the Japan team's first match in an "International A Match". She played three games for Japan in 1981. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 1981 3 0 Total 3 0 ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese footballers Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Shimizudaihachi Pleiades players Category:1981 AFC Women's Championship players
title: Chieko Homma
